Menkominfo Targetkan 4.000 BTS Dibangun pada 2020
01 Nov 2019, 07:02 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi (CNN Indonesia/Agnes Savithri).

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika (Menkominfo) Johnny G. Plate menargetkan penyelesaian 4.000 menara pemancar atau Base Transceiver Station (BTS) pada 2020.Direktur Utama Badan Aksesibilitas Telekomunikasi dan Informasi (Bakti) Anang Latif mengatakan Bakti akan fokus menyiapkan 500 BTS pada 2019. Sisa BTS yang belum dibangun akan digarap pada 2020."Target utama menyelesaikan 4.000 BTS. Pada 2019 ini karena sudah ada arahan pak menteri di bulan Oktober digarap 500. Kami persiapkan untuk cepat menyelesaikan 3.500 pada 2020," kata Anang usai diskusi Forum Merdeka Barat (FMB) 9 di Kantor Kemenkominfo, Kamis (31/10).Anang mengatakan anggaran BTS tak hanya dari dana Kewajiban Layanan Universal atau Universal Service Obligation (USO), tapi juga dari Anggaran Pendapatan dan Belanja Negara (APBN). Berdasarkan data koordinasi dengan operator, Anang mengatakan ada 5.000 desa yang akan dibangun BTS.Anang mengatakan seribu BTS sudah dibangun di luar target 4.000 BTS tambahan tersebut. Akan tetapi, 1.000 BTS ini masih 2G, ia mengatakan akan meningkatkan kapasitas BTS ke 4G."5.000 desa yang diminta pemerintah untuk memberikan katakanlah subsidi untuk program ini," katanya.Sebelumnya, Presiden Joko Widodo mengatakan pemerintah bakal membangun sekitar 4.000 BTS tahun depan.Pengadaan BTS ini dilakukan untuk meningkatkan jaringan internet dan konektivitas digital di seluruh wilayah Indonesia.(jnp/lav)

The Minister of Communication and Information Targets 4,000 BTS to be Built in 2020
01 Nov 2019, 07:02 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration (CNN Indonesia / Agnes Savithri).

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Johnny G. Plate is targeting the completion of 4,000 transmitter towers or Base Transceiver Station (BTS) by 2020. President Director of the Telecommunications and Information Accessibility Agency (Bakti) Anang Latif said Bakti will focus on preparing 500 BTS in 2019. The remaining BTS that have not yet been built will be worked on by 2020. "The main target is completing 4,000 BTS. In 2019, there will be 500 ministers directed in October. We are preparing to quickly complete 3,500 by 2020," Anang said after the discussion West Merdeka Forum (FMB) 9 at the Office of the Ministry of Communication and Information, Thursday (10/31). Yang said the BTS budget was not only from the Universal Service Obligation (USO) fund, but also from the State Budget (APBN). Based on coordination data with operators, Anang said there were 5,000 villages to be built by BTS. Anang said that one thousand BTS had been built outside the target of 4,000 additional BTS. However, 1,000 BTS is still 2G, he said he would increase the capacity of BTS to 4G. "5,000 villages were asked by the government to provide say subsidies for this program," he said. Earlier, President Joko Widodo said the government would build around 4,000 BTS next year. This BTS procurement is done to improve internet network and digital connectivity throughout Indonesia. (Jnp / lav)
